general.bio: Sergey Mechtaev is an Assistant Professor at Peking University. Previously, he obtained a PhD degree from the National University of Singapore, and was a faculty member at University College London. His research aims to automate the development and maintenance of trustworthy software. It has been recognized by prestigious awards, notably, an ACM SIGSOFT Outstanding Dissertation Award and two ACM SIGSOFT Distinguished Paper Awards, and has been deployed in industry, at Bloomberg, and academia, at IIT Kanpur.
